title: Home - Integrative Medical Specialists
description: Our team of licensed Naturopathic doctors and health professionals are dedicated and passionate in helping our patients achieve their health and wellness goals.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Integrative Medical Specialists. Our team of licensed Naturopathic doctors and health professionals are dedicated and passionate in helping our patients achieve their health and wellness goals. We provide cutting edge, comprehensive testing and screening methods combined with customized treatment plans to give our patients an exceptional healthcare experience. We look forward to helping you and your family in your journey to health. Call us at 913-825-6111 and one of our trained health professionals would love to talk with you and answer any questions you might have. Embracing the Healing Power of Nature to Treat the Whole Person
